1.content: It is midnight and Max is tossing and turning in his sleep. When He awakens he finds himself on the cold ground of a cave. You continue the story as
1.title: The start of terror

11.content: Max awoke and found himself on the cold, damp ground of a cave. "Where am I?" he asks himself. He gets up and walks into a tunnel that led to a fork in the path. Max strained his ears and listened for sounds coming from the two paths. He hears the sound of a waterfall and nods to himself
11.title: Max.

111.content: He walks quietly to the left and follows the path until he sees the waterfall. He looks around and sees what looks like a way out of the cave. He also sees a semi-deep pool that looked like steam was wafting off it.
111.title: Left towards the waterfall

choices: it's not water he's jumping into
1112.content: He walks over to the pool and pulls his clothes off, tossing them onto a rock beside him. He grins and jumps into the pool.
1112.title: to the pool

11121.content: He swims to the side and lets out a sigh of relief. "Ahh, that feels good" he murmers to himself. He grunts softly and the water around him bubbles for a moment before dying down. He giggles at his fart and lets out another sigh, before pulling himself out of the pool with a groan. He slips his clothes back on and walks to the exit, letting one rip as he does so. " heh, shouldn't have had those bean burritos before bed" he comments to himself. He reaches the exit and...
11121.title: He relaxes

111211.content: He exits the cave and looks around, finding himself in a forest. He hears a growl and then the snap of a twig. "Who's there?" He calls out loudly. The only response is the whistle of the wind. Then he hears footsteps behind him.
111211.title: leaves the cave

1112111.content: He spins around quickly and finds himself face to face with a pair of glowing eyes.
1112111.title: He turns around

11121111.content: The wolf looks down at him and begins to snicker at his fright. "Woah there little guy, don't be scared" the wolf says, trying to calm down the apparently skitish child. "Please don't eat me" Max begs the wolf. "Hey, who said anything about eating you? Though I am rather peckish." the wolf states musingly.
11121111.title: It's an anthro wolf

111211111.content: "Little guy, don't worry, I won't eat you" the wolfman tells him. "I'm not the one that you need to worry about. This forest area is filled with things that would like to eat the both of us. You have a couple options about what to do next. I could drop you off somewhere safer, or we could go to my den, it's not far from here and would only take a few minutes of running with you on my back to get there." the wolf states. Max thinks things over and makes a choice.
111211111.title: wolf friend

1112111111.content: "lets go to your den." Max says. The wolf nods and puts him on his back, before speeding away. Max yells in fright as the wolf runs, darting in between the trees like speed given a physical form. They arrive at a hole in the ground and jump in. After he gets off the wolf and kisses the ground in appreciation, Max looks around, finding three wolves looking at him with amusement on the faces. "Little one, these are my cubs, Matt, Toby, and Remus" the wolf tells you, laughter in his voice. "So what do we do now?" Max asks the older wolf. "we wait until daybreak and then we try and figure out a way for you to get home." he says, surprising Max. "How did you know that I wasn't from here?" he ask. "Oh, well, the king has decreed that all human children are to be eaten on sight, and after looking into it, I discovered that there is a prophecy between him and a human child, one that predicts his destruction if they face each other in battle." The wolf tells him. "If you're supposed to eat me, why haven't you?" Max asks. "Well for one thing, I was full. For another, I guess I want to give you a chance to face him. However, that dosen't mean one of us won't eat you, just that we won't right now." the wolf warns him. "Now try and get some sleep, while I work on a way for you to stop the king." the wolf says. Max nods his head, confused about how to treat the wolves.
1112111111.title: To the den

11121111111.content: Several hours later, Max awoke to a full bladder and the need to empty it was too strong to ignore, so he slips out of den and walks over to a tree a few feet away. He pulls down his pants and takes a leak, whistling softly as he does so. As he goes pee, he begins to feel like he's being watched, so he glances around and sees something in the shadows.
11121111111.title: During the night

111211111111.content: He sees that it's a wolf and as it steps into the moonlight, he sees it clearly.
111211111111.title: it's one of  the wolves

1112111111112.content: You're still to far away to see who it is exactly, but as it bounds toward you, it's identiy becomes clear.
1112111111112.title: a wolf pup

11121111111122.content: It's the youngest Toby. "What are you doing out here?" you ask him.
11121111111122.title: Toby

111211111111222.content: "Wh-what do you mean"? Max stutters out. the cub gives Max a wolfy grin "I think you know what I mean human" he states, his belly letting out a growl for emphasis. Toby licks his lips and sniffs the air "you smell delicious max and I think you'll taste just as good" Toby says before lunging at the boy.
111211111111222.title: getting a midnight snack

1112111111112221.content: Max lets out a shriek as the wolf child lunges at him, falling to the ground with the wolf's mouth around his neck. He goes still as the wolf puts a little pressure on the boy's throat. Max whimpers as he feels the tongue lap and taste his pulsing arteries.
1112111111112221.title: Max is pounced on

11121111111122211.content: Toby groans and engulfs the boy's head. Gulp by gulp, the scared boy is slowly slurped into the sweltering stomach of the wolf cub. The cub's stomach is bulging and squirming and he gives a grin, rubbing his belly.
11121111111122211.title: goes down soft

111211111111222111.content:
Toby lays back against a tree and rubs his bulging belly. "Let me go" wails Max and Toby grins toothily. "I'll let you out human, in a few hours. "What!" he hears Max shriek. Toby smiles in thought "I'll let you down after my belly done with you" To make his point, Toby belches loudly and snickers. His belly starts to gurgle audibly and he burps again before going back into the cave. As he walks back to where he was sleeping he sees his dad glance at him, look at his stomach before laughing softly and going back to sleep. Toby follows his example and curls next to him, drifting off into sleep.
In the morning he wakes up and notices that his bowels and bladder feel full. Toby quietly walks outside and goes pee, sighing as he relieved himself. He turned around, squatted down and farted loudly before his anus opened and he started to poop. He groans as Max's remains are pushed out of his bowels. He gets up and looks at the results of his midnight snack. He licks his lips in remembrance before walking back inside
111211111111222111.title: Digest

choices: My what big teeth you have (hard)
111211112.content: Max looks at the wolf anthro with wide eyes as it circles him, leaning in every so often to get a good whiff of his scent. As it leans down to sniff his behind, he lets out a thick fart into the wolf's face. The wolf licks it's lips and lets out a groan. "mmm, that smelled wonderful, You'll make a most scrumptious supper for me" it states with a deep growling voice, drool leaking from it's lips. "Please don't eat me, I don't want to die" max pleads at the beast. The wolf ignores him and shrugs his shoulders, before pouncing on the boy. It gives his cheek a good lick and moans at his taste. "How would you like to be eaten? slowly or quickly?" it asks him. "I don't want to be eaten at all" max tells the hungry wolf. "Well then I'll decide for you" it tells him.
111211112.title: You're dinner

1112111121.content: It opens it's large mouth and swollows his feet, pulling Max's knees and thighs into it's throat. Max shrieks and screams;swinging his fists at the creature that's eating him. It growls and grabs hold of his arms, before taking a deep gulp and pulling his butt and waist into it's mouth. He feels his feet enter the wolf's stomach and starts to flail and thrash around even harder, trying to get loose. The wolf pushes down on him, while holding onto his arms and taking a gulp, pulling him in up to his chest. "Please don't do this? I don't want to be your food." Max begs. His only response is a loud gulp as the wolf swollows him. The wolf then pushes down again, sending his chest and shoulers into it's mouth. "No! don't swollow" Max screams at the wolf. The wolf does just that and swollows, pulling max's head into it's mouth and down it's throat. It leans against a tree and licks it's lips, growling in satisfaction. "I knew you'd taste good meat" it tells Max. "Please let me go?" Max shouts at the creature.
1112111121.title: Get in my belly (Soft)

11121111212.content:
"No. there has been an order from the king to kill all human children on sight."
Inside the monsters stomach Max is sobbing in fear, he didn't want to die and he esspecially didn't want to die and turn into this creature's poop. "Please don't do this, I'm to young to die" he begs the beast. His only response is a loud belch the empties the stomach of air. "No.. please... let me out?" he begs with his last breath, before closing his eyes and passing out. As he does so the beast's stomach comes to life and begins to churn him about.
The beast listens to the child's last words and belches again. The smell of digesting human on his breath. He rubs his stomach and watches as it shrinks quickly to it's normal size, his bowels filling with the boy's remains. He raises his tail and blows a fart into the air, before squating down and taking a dump. His anus opens and a long, thick log drops to the ground, followed by several more. He finishes with a quick urination, before getting up and admiring his handiwork. "You were a good meal brat" it tells his dung, before going home.
11121111212.title: the end of max

11121112.content:
Standing over 8 feet tall, was a bluish woman with tusks coming from her mouth. Her animal hide bra and skirt did nothing to hide her muscular build, though there was enough details to tell someone that she was a female. Holding a club behind her head, she was sizing Max up and her grin didn't leave her face the whole time.
"What's a cutie doing all the way here?" The mysterious woman asks, surprising him.
"I'm lost and have no idea where I am after leaving that cave over there," the boy answers back, shaking off his surprise, while her eyes twinkle a bit.
"Is that so? Well then, come with me back to my camp, and I'll explain everything," she said, Max having no choice but to follow her.
"First off, you're in Falkos region, a place where no humans should be, and is currently ruled by the maou. If another troll other than me showed up, you could have been in big trouble," she explains, Max raising an eyebrow, but not questioning it, as he's with a blue lady with tusks.
Max soon realize that he's probably on different world, far from his, and he has no choice but to stay with her until he finds a way home.
"Besides, I'm surprised you managed to avoid that monster in the cave back there, with its terrible roar," she adds in, making Max blush red from embarrassment.
"Actually, about that, that was me. I farted back there," he admits, turning red.
The troll looks at him with curiousity before squinting an eye and lifting a leg as a massive fart roared past her muscular bum. Gagging from the stench, Max looks on as the troll sighs in relief from her flatulence and whaft the smell away.
"Now I farted, so no biggie! In fact, my friend farts even more than me and I consider myself a gassy gal! I going to meet up with her. You'll love her and she's very friendly!" She said, grabbing him under her arm and running as fast as she can, while her butt pushes out more farts from her bowels.
"Wait! You didn't tell me your name! I'm Max!" The human shouts out.
"Carly," she replies.
It wasn't long before they reached the camp and they could hear a woman groan before farting.
"Rayiln, it's Carly! I brought back a guest!" Carly yells out, before some shuffling is heard.
Heavy thumps comes towards them and soon reveals ....
11121112.title: A 'troll down the road

111212.content: He hears a loud roar. He turns around and finds himself staring at a seven foot tall ogre, it 's fangs glistening with drool. It sniffs the air and grabs Max by the back of his pants, it raises him to it's nose and sniffs his rear, licking it's lips as it does so. Max screams loudly and thrashes around, trying to make the beast let him go.
111212.title: he's ambushed by something

1112122.content: The creature stuffs part of him in it's mouth and sucks on him. As he does Max screams and hopes that it won't chew him.
1112122.title: Failure. He's food

11121221.content: The creature swallows and pulls Max down his throat. Max loses all sense of direction as he's pulled down the esophagus, his drool soaked form sliding down the dank tube to the creature's belly. His head pushes out of a sphincter followed by his shoulders and torso, he curls up in the creature's gut as more of him enters the stomach. The smell is awful and the air is old. "Let me out!" he shouts He hears a loud rumbling laugh come from the monster.
11121221.title: max: gulped

111212211.content:
Max shouts in frustration and pounds on the walls surrounding him. "Let me out of here" he screams. As if in response to his pleas the ogre belches loudly and the air thins dramatically. Max gasps and pants, his eyes wide with fear and dread. With one last strike against the stomach he folds in on himself and passes out. He never experiences the acids flooding the chamber in response to his presence. The acids work on him for an hour, transforming him in to a nutritious slop for the ogre.
As the ogre walks back to his post his bowels rumble and he squats down. He grunts and pushes Max's remains out into a pile. He turns around and pees on it before turning around and walking away, his job well done.
111212211.title: it digests him

11121222.content: The ogre bites down hard on Max's arm tearing it from it's socket, and rips it from his body. The young boy lets out a pained scream as the monster drops him to the ground and slowly chews his arm. The crying Max tries to stumble to his feet as an ogre foot stomps down hard on his young body pinning him to the ground the ogre grows as the boy lets out a pained wispier "why", then grabs his right leg and pulls it out of it's socket. Max screams in pain, wanting to be dead already. The flesh and ligament severs completely as the boy's leg is amputated. The huge monster shoves it into his gullet and savors the taste of the lithe hairless leg. Sensing the boy's death is imminent, the ogre raises Max, or whats left of him to his mouth. The ogre opens his mouth and places Max's reaming leg inside. He bits down hard and pulls the boy by his torso, ripping his body in two, Max intestines and blood spilling out of his body like bolonaise . At this moment Max is barely conscious and too weak to scream. Sensing his death approaching the ogre chews the food in his mouth and swallows. He then places the boy's head onto his teeth and slowing bites down on him. Max lets out a soft moan as his skull cracks and fractures piecing his brain. Blood runs out of Max's ear and his eyeball pops as the giant beast increases pressure on his young face. Finally the ogre's teeth touch and Max is no more the monster savors the taste of the boy's head before swallowing and finishing off his torso, before finally scooping up Max's spilt organs and slurping them into his mouth. feeling full the beast wandered off looking for his next meal, hopefully another tasty human boy.
11121222.title: max: chewed

11122.content: The moment he hits the liquid, he notices that something isn't right, the water isn't water at all it's...
11122.title: it's not water he's jumping into

111222.content: He lets out a high pitched scream as the acid burns him. He swims towards the edge of the pool and grips it.
111222.title: Acid

1112222.content: Just as Max is about to pull himself out, a hand reaches down and grabs him by his arms and lugs him into the air. He lets out a scream when he sees who's holding him. It's a troll and it's grinning sadistically. "Nope, you can't leave the pool yet" it tells him in a gruff voice, before it walks into the pool, a squirming max under it's arm. The pool's upto the troll's waist and it grunts before farting, making the pool of acid bubble. "time to go back in the pool human" it says to Max, before it shoves him under the acid. He flails for a moment before his arms go slack and the creature lets go, dropping the rest into the liquid. It farts again and as the pool bubbles, the bubbles bring a human skull to the top of the water. It grabs the skull and gets out of the pool, before tossing his skull into a pile of bones.
1112222.title: Max's acid bath

12.content: You feel a disturbance in the natural aura of you kingdom. You concentrate on the disturbance and see a teenage boy waking up inside a cave. He's not supposed to be here you think. You call your advisors and they appear next to you. "My liege what do you command.?" "Worms" you think to yourself," they have no spines". "Advisers we have a human in are midst". "Do you think he's the one from the legend"?. "He might be", "the legend said a child of human origins would arrive to overthrow the current king and take his throne"." I can't take that chance, send out the hunters." "Which ones"? The trolls. He's in their cave". "Yes my Lord your will be done". The story changes to
12.title: The king's worries

122.content: The king has commanded the death of the boy and your only to happen to comply. You are a seven foot tall troll and you are on a mission. You slowly sneak up to the boy's area, you see him wading through the cave's pond. You pick up a large tree branch, and slowly make your way around the water and wait. You swing the branch and hit him from the side. He's flung into the wall. He gets up, it looks like he's rather dizzy, good you think. You rush at him and pick him up by the throat.
122.title: the hunters

1221.content: The brat throws dirt into your eyes blinding you. He runs and you groan and go report back to the king, telling him you've failed.
1221.title: He gets free

12212.content: You've escaped, and now that you have you see a sign up ahead.
12212.title: Max

122122.content: You take the path into the forest, it's farther away from the cave than the beach is. As you run you hear a wolf howl. As you dash, you trip over a rock are knocked out. You awaken to see a
122122.title: To the forest

1221221.content: "Oh, hello there." A youthful, somewhat pouty, voice came from above as you rose back to your feet. To your surprise you found a humanoid wolf of some sort. Her fur was cotton-candy pink, besides her creamy white tummy. She was extremelly fluffy, making her seem like a strange mix of wolf, cat, and fox. From her height and voice you would assume her to be a child, maybe eight or nine, though it was difficult to tell. Her tail swished as she took a step forward and looked you over. She didn't seem like much of a threat, but you were not ready to trust anything in this strange place. You quickly scurried back to your feet. "H...hello. My name is Max..." At this she interrupted. "I know who you are. The King is in a fit about you, some prophocy nonsense or something." You of course had no idea what the wolf was talking about, but she at least did not seem to have a high opinion of the king. "What kind of pr..." Once again, she cut in. "I wasn't finished. I think the entire matter is stupid. But, the king's commands are the king's commands." The wolf girl smiled slightly, ever so slightly, and took a step forward, her large tail swishing. "My name is Biyo, Duchess of Dark Dreams. You can consider it a mark of pride that you were eaten by me."
1221221.title: Anthro wolf

12212212.content: You lick your lips and stalk towards the now cowering child. oh don't worry sweetie, being eaten won't hurt and your death will give me both prestige and another layer of fat on my belly. As you pounce on the boy, you wonder how you'll eat him.
12212212.title: Continue as Biyo

122122121.content: You open your mouth wide and engulf his head. Swollowing you pull the struglling child further down your throat, swollowing down to his navel. He tastes of sweat and fear, and you relish it, swollowing again down to his rump. You hold his butt and push it gently inside your maw, soaking it in your drool, before swollowing it and sucking down to his knees. Then with a tilt of your head and a slurp, you suck his legs down like noodles unitil all that's left are his feet. You remove his shoes and swollow his feet, tasting the flavors in his socks. You nearly purr in satisfaction as he enters your stomach fully, the only evidence of his existence, your squirming belly. You hear him cry out for help and feel a slight amount of guilt. Maybe you should let him out and help him take down the king?
122122121.title: with your mouth

1221221212.content: No, if you let him go and the king found out, he'd eat you himself. You lean back against a tree and smile slightly, it felt so good to be this full and you giggle with the knowledge that soon the child will provide you with plenty of padding for your fur. The wriggling in your belly settles down after an hour and soon his cries become loud gurgles as he's churned into a mushy goop. Hours later, you feel your now soft and fat stomach, before groaning in discomfort. You walk over to a tree and raise your tail, before squating down and pushing his remains out onto the ground. As you get up, you feel air in your stomach and release it in a loud burp. Well child, you were a very tasty meal she tells his remains.
1221221212.title: digest him

1221222.content: You see a being only about four feet tall. He has glowing red eyes and very nasty looking claws. He grins before telling you he is shades the boogeyman.
1221222.title: Something worse

12212221.content: You look over the child your master wants dead. There's a look of defiance in his eyes. Hmm he might be able to kill the king and restore balance. But then again he is only a child and what can he do against the might of the king. He might survive until he meets the king. However the king will kill him easily. what to do? Should I help him or should I obey my king and go with my nature.
12212221.title: continue as shades

122122212.content: He looks so tasty. I wonder what his flavor is. You look at him and decide to give in to your nature. Now how to kill him. Should I eat him whole or in pieces? Or should I kill him and eat him later? And should I deage him before he dies.
122122212.title: Give in to your instincts

1221222121.content: Now all I have to do is decide how to eat him.
1221222121.title: Hard or soft

12212221212.content: The feeling of a whole being inside me should feel terrific. Now should he be deaged or not
12212221212.title: soft

122122212122.content: Now little boy, your death has been ordered by the king. His eyes widen in fear. Why? Because might overthrow him. I won't he pleads loudly. Nope sorry but rules are rules and you have to die. You grab the little scamp and lift his face to yours. You sniff him and smell his yummy fear. Now say hello to my belly for me. You open you mouth and suck his head in. As he flails you continue to consume him, sucking his shoulders and upper chest in. You swollow and a bulge appears in your throat. You continue to gulp until only his rump and legs are not in you. You remedy that with a quick swollow and slurp. You suck in his legs and feet and shut your mouth before swollowing loudly. You feel him enter your stomach and groan in contentment. Now what to do. You hear him yelling and begging to be let out. Hmm should I? Or should I take him to the king and let him deal with his enemy
122122212122.title: nope, just gulp him

1221222121221.content: Now how should I let him out
1221222121221.title: let him out

12212221212212.content: Mmm that child tasted better than anything you'd eaten in centuries. You feel air beginining to gather in your stomach, pat your wiggiling belly and belch loudly. You stomach begins to gurgle and you hear his screams as he's digested. You phase your hand into your stomach and feel around for his head. You grab it and pull his head out of your stomach. He's wimpering now, covered in goo and you smile at him. Take your last taste of fresh air, after this you won't be able to breathe. Then you shove his head back into your acid filled stomach and belch again. He screams loudly once more before going silent. Your stomach is now gurgling loudly as it works his remains over. You rub your stomach and laugh. You phase your hands in once more looking for his head. You find it and pull it out. His head is whole still, so you push it back in and go find a place to sleep for the night. In the morning you awaken and feel your stomach empty once more. Your bowels however feel full, so you find a place on the ground, lift your tail and begin to crap him out. It takes only a few minutes to push the digested remains of a thirteen year old out onto the ground in a pile that's almost four feet high. You turn around and look at it, You see something sticking out and find that it his skull. You pull it out and vanish to show the king that his enemy is dead.
12212221212212.title: Digested

1221222121222.content: Lets let the king decide what to do. You teleport and appear in front of the king. My liege I have the brat here in my belly. He's stll alive and well, what should Ido to him?
1221222121222.title: go to the king

12212221212221.content: You stick your hand into your belly and phase the boy out. He looks at the king in fear and who could blame him. The king was nine feet tall, weighed eight hundred pounds and had massive jaws. He leers at the boy and says " you have been turned over to me for your execution. Now you see those bones, he says pointing to a pile of bones in the corner of the room. Those are what your wish you were when I'm done. He plucks the boy up and shoves him into his mouth. he shuts it and swishes the boy around before gulping him down. You watch as the bulge goes into his stomach. You ask if you can watch when he lets him out. The king smirks and agrees. You walk off and hide behind a pillar. You wait and before long he starts to laugh. Brat time to die. The king inhales and then lets loose the largest belch you'd ever heard. he snickers and belches again and again until your sure all the airs vanished from his belly. He then gets up and walks away. Later that day he call you to his disposal room. He tell you he's gonna let the brat out. He breaks wind and defacates the boy out in one long rope. Well the kids no threat now. Nope he says with intense amusment now he's only my waste.
12212221212221.title: A kingly meal

12212222.content: What do you want? you ask in fright.
12212222.title: continue as max.

122122221.content: I dislike what the king is doing and offer my aid. You look him over and decide to
122122221.title: To aid you child

choices: Come with me back to my lair for the night
There's a secret passage ahead that will take you to the palace
1221222211.content: Thank you Shades, I accept your offer, you tell him. So what do we do.
1221222211.title: Accept his offer

choices: You awajen and decide to explore
you stay asleep and are awakened by shades
12212222111.content: As you walk you notice the tree's looking sicker and some are already dead, the air smells fouler and it has gotten colder. You reach a large house and enter it. be careful child, there are many traps here and I would be displeased if you maimed or killed your self. You yawn and he sends you off to bed.
12212222111.title: Come with me back to my lair for the night

122122221111.content: You get up and see that it's only been a couple of hours since both of you went to bed, but since you have so much energy you decide to go search the house. As you get out the door you hear a noise coming from downstairs.
122122221111.title: you wake up and go exploring

choices: a boy, chained to the wall
1221222211111.content: As you walk down the stairs the sound gets louder, you see a door and open it. Inside is
1221222211111.title: follow the noise

choices: He bites your neck and drinks your blood
12212222111111.content: You see what looks like a chubby ten year old boy chained to the wall. He gasps for help and you rush over. Open the locks he says and you unclock them with a key that was on the table. As you rush for the key, you slam the door shut. You unlock them and turn your back. He gets this look in his eye and grabs you. How do you think I got to be so chubby if I was being kept captive. I eat those who wander down here.
12212222111111.title: a boy, chained to the wall

122122221111111.content: You only have time to give a startled yelp before the the boy leaned up and sunk his teeth into the side of your throat. You can feel sharp teeth sink in, and you begin to feel weak as he sucks inward, hot saliva dripping on your neck. It hurts remarkably less then you would expect, the bite was the only real pain, and you gradually fade out. As your conciousness finally returns, you look up, to find the chubby boy standing over you. He grins with a little laugh. "It's about time you woke up." You try to sit, but are still too weak from blood loss. "I left you with just enough blood to survive, your going to be my slave. I doubt his highness will mind as long as I keep you in here. Of course, if you ever disobey me, then I'll eat you right away." After a few minutes you finally manage to sit up by the wall, glancing about for some means of escape.
122122221111111.title: Into his trap

choices: Think of something fun to do together.
1221222211111112.content: As Max sits up, you notice him looking around the chamber, probably for some way to fight against you. You give him a taunting grin as you walk closer and turn around. Max gets out a confused "Huh, what are..." before you push your big chubby butt right in his face. All that blood has stirred up your stomach a bit, and you let out a lengthy fart into your slave's face. He coughs and gags as he tries to wiggle out, the horrible gas burning his nose and mouth. After ten seconds you pull off, Max looking as if he might pass out.
1221222211111112.title: A little fun

122122221111112.content: He slobers on your cheek, getting a taste. He seems to like it and opens his mouth wide, before englufing your head whole. He moans as he sucks on your head, before swollowing your shoulders and upper chest. He has pinned your arms to your sides and is swollowing down to your navel, he licks at it before swollowing down to your butt and then to your knees. Then with the toss of his head swollows your calves and feet. He gulps and pats his engorged belly.
122122221111112.title: He licks your cheek

1221222211111121.content:
This is all just some crazy dream - hardly even a nightmare - you think. Just some crazy ridiculous dream... totally unreal After all - a monster king - a boogeyman named Shades - and now you just got swallowed whole, completely naked, by a kid younger than you. Is it some kind of metaphor for your lost youth or something? You imagine the paunchy belly of the boy with you inside. He slaps it a couple of times before letting out a raspy belch. Really... this is starting to get ridiculous.

You expect to wake up any minute, but the dream never fades away. Instead, you become increasingly aware of an irritating itch all over your body. {Nah - no way/i} you're just imagining things, of course. You try to think of the last time you felt discomfort in a dream. Well... at any rate, you'd rather wake up so as not to experience the things that happen further along. You blush recalling the anatomical processes you'd rather not dream through. The kid was cute, but I'd rather not dream about being his poop. Would you call such an unnecessary and gross dream a nightmare? Perhaps.

20 minutes later, and the boy has clearly tossed himself into bed, rubbing his gut lovingly. You, on the other hand, are really regretting not being able to wake up from this nightmare. The irritation turns to pain as gloppy acid oozes into the boy's stomach and onto your skin. It's melting your freakin' skin! "Hey! Let me out kid!" You plead, embarrassed to be totally owned by a kid younger than you. "No way, human Max. The king will reward me handsomely for disposing of you. Besides, I'll get to add you to my chubby body. Shades told you about the prophecy, I suppose? Do you wonder, then, if you AREN'T the human child destined to overthrow the king? None of my other snacks have been. BURRRRP!" This sends a chill up your spine - which is an accomplishment, considering you're sweltering inside the 10 year old's tummy. "No, my delicious meal, I'm afraid the only thing you're destined for is a pile in the corner of the cave. Haha!"

You scream as the acid flows more freely now. It seeps into your nose, your mouth, your eyes and mercilessly digests you as the boy snoozes. Okay - this is definitely a dream you think...If this were real, you'd have passed out and died... Well... unfortunately for you, this is real, but even worse, it's the Nightmare world, where nightmares are lived out to their conclusions. Since you, yourself, voiced concerns for having to live out digestion to its disgusting conclusion, this world has fated you are doomed to experience just that.

You hear cute little snores and wish you, too would pass out and get respite from the pain of being digested slowly by a kid, but no such relief comes. His powerful gastric enzymes have melted off your skin and muscles. You're now just a sentient soup of boy nutrients sloshing around in a peristaltic washing machine of a stomach. Powerful contractions grind your bones down to gristle. On a positive note, you no longer experience pain, but are still party to the slimy, vomitous conditions around you and are shocked at the suction of his intestines which demand your nutritious slurry. Suddenly, you're afraid - you're really going to have to experience the humiliation of the whole process. I wish I could just go head and wake up from this shitty dream you lament.

As the source for the boy's gurgling and burbling borborygmus, you sense his body's secretions- making you slippery and slimy - aiding in the breakdown of fats. His intestines demand them for use for his own pudge. Nature's call is down the line, and every now and then, a greasy fart will snap you back to the reality that you're a few hours away from being his shit.NO! I definitely don't want to dream about that you think with a shudder - well, you can't exactly shudder as you're getting squirted into his colon, now can you?

The smell hits you. Why!? you groan. Literally - you're making all kinds of disgusting noises - enough to wake him up. All morning long, you slither through his bowels, thickening into a shitty slurry. I just want out! you think, unwisely reckless what you're wishing for. Now you're becoming aware that your color is slowly but surely transitioning from yellow to brown. This is disgusting! Who dreams about this!? You wonder.

You do... or at least that's what you think. You're experiencing it for real, of course. The long, slow trip to his butthole is coming to a close. You can feel yourself solidifying and smoothing out. Oh god! This is so humilitaing. Can't I just wake up.... "Help! Help! PLEASE IN HERE! Get me loose!" you can hear the boy's crocodile tears and his trap has been set - apparently another fool is ready to fall for his for his cruel catfishing.

"Yes!... The key is right there." PFFFT. "Right over.." PBLBLBT "Excuse me.... It's on that table." A violent contraction shuffles you southward with disgusting wet sounds and you see a little bit of light - well, a loincloth. This is... unexpected. Oh, and awful- don't forget awful. "Thank you so much, food. Hehe!" GROANNN "How do you think I got to be so chubby if I... You know what... wait here!" CLICK.

You hear the protests of a young kid. Probably even younger than the boy who ate you. Another powerful squeeze and the boy groans. "Heh- what's your name kid?" ... "Caleb? You believe in fortune telling, Caleb? 'Cause you're about to see your future!" oh no! he did not! He did. More disgusting slick sounds and you see a six year old kid - disgust and horror splayed across his face - chained to the wall. The scene is framed by hairless butt cheeks flanking the left and right of your view. You, Max the turd, slither out of the boy's butthole. You gather he's hunched over doggy style because your slimy brown form pokes outward and then gravity drags you down along the boy's taint and balls. You leave an impressive smudge before his butthole pinches. The first steaming log you've become lands with a wet PLOP on the stone floor.

"Caleb... NGGGH! I'd like to introduce you to Max... MMMH He had the pleasure of being yesterday's meal." More pushing... More pooping. This cannot be happening! you complain as you're slowly dumped out of a ten year old boy's butthole into an impressively large and growing pile. The boy continues, "Although, as you can see... MMMGH The pleasure... of today's dump is all.. mine! AHHHH" The mess you're making is incomprehensible. Finally, the last log of poop is eased out of his pucker and lands with a THWACK atop the pile. He farts a couple more times and saunters over to poor Caleb. Ripping off the boy's shirt, he cleans up his disgusting crack. "You won't be needing this where you're going, Caleb. Taking off your clothes makes you more digestible. See... you now get the pleasure of being today's meal!"

You feel yourself phasing out of consciousness. Finally! Waking up from this NIGHTMARE you think in relief and shame. As embarrassing as it will be to remember, this dream will definitely be a secret... wait - you're not waking up... you're passing out. Forever. You sit and start to cool off - a very real pile of boy turds.

The boy licks his lips as he turns to Caleb... "Where were we?" His stomach growls in answer. "Ah yes..."
1221222211111121.title: Continure as max

1221222211111122.content: The child had been easy to trick, he tasted so good going down my throat and even now he's at the mercy of my digestive system. I can feel him wiggiling around inside and it feels so good. As I lean back I picture what I know is happening to him inside me. He's scared and my acid's begining to rise. The thrashing inside is getting faster and harder, I can feel air in my belly. I open my mouth and let rip a loud belch. Everything goes silent but my belly, digesting him into goo. I lay down and rest for a few minutes. Later I get up and pull my pants down. I squat and shit the boy out. It takes minutes until I'm empty and I look at my shit. It's riddled with his bones and clothing, I stick my hand in and remove his skull. No one messes with the king.
1221222211111122.title: Continue as the boy

Your feet enter the belly and his gullet closes up. It smells in hear and you can't help to think of what else must he have eaten and digested. You begin to feel like that goldfish you ate. Then you recall a horrifying memory; you remember eating the fish, and feeling it in you stomach, you remember how it felt to digest it alive and you rememeber pooping it out into the toilet. That's what's going to happen to you and you begin to thrash about inside his belly. Outside the troll is now licking his lips and pat his squirming stomach.

Your remains go through his the entire length of his bowels turning into waste and nurishing him for the coming day. The troll had since fallen asleep after his kid's meal and so was unable to see his stomach slowly fade back to it's normal size. When he awoke he grunted and walked over to a hole in the floor. He sat over it and took a dump. He crapped you out and stood up. He took a pee and walked back over to his nest before falling back asleep

122122221111211.title: open the left one

The ogre places you in a pair of chains and raises you into the air. Your feet flail as he sniffs you. Then he grabs hold of your hair and pulls it. He then puts his mouth over your head and bites it off. You go limp, and he chews your head up. He swollows and drops you to the ground. Then he proceeds to tear you apart. He tears the meat of your arms and legs. The he eats the bones, chewing them with distinct crunching sounds. Then he tears into your gut and empties it with a single slurp and gulp. He eats your butt and groin, before tearing your chest open and eating your ribs, then he munches on your heart and lungs. After that, he proceeds to reduce you to a skeleton, then he chews the skeleton up. He finishes with a gulp and a belch. He leans back and licks his lips and figners clean of your blood. Then he lays back and lets you digest.
Hours later he's sitting next to the piles of dung and takes a dump. He shits you from his bowels and pees on what's left of your form. 12212222112111.title: Fatality

See those skulls? he asks, while pointing to several shelves filled with skulls of all different sizes, that's all that'll be left of you. He presses a button and you begin to lower into the acid. You begin to fight at your bonds, trying to escape, but it's no use. You scream when you hit the acid, as you lower into it you find that your going numb. The last thing you see is him smilling at you, before your fully in the acid. A minute later, he has the pole brought back up, and all that's left of you is a skeleton. He removes the skull, placing it with the others. Then he drops the rest of your bones back in the acid.

1221222211212.title: it's him

12212222112122.content: You scream as you feel your very being begin to burn, you hear another scream and look to see that the king is shrinking, right before you shut your eyes and pass out. Moments later you awaken and see the entire world differently. You look over to the king and gasp, where there was once a very large and ugly monster; now a boy stood in his place. What happened to you? you ask him. You stole my powers and turned me back into what I was when I killed the old king. He smirks at you and trys to hit you. You stop him with you mind and wonder for a moment, that if he had this much power, why the heck he didn't kill you with it. You feel your stomach rumble and your mouth begins to water. Looking over his form you decide that you will finish off the former king and take his place. You grin evilly at him and he begins to shake, realizing that you intend to do what he was going to do to you.
12212222112122.title: gives you the king's powers

1222.content: You headbutt him and he passes out. You look him over, the king said to kill him he didn't say how to do it though. You could devour him, or you could swollow him whole, or you could just kill him and leave the body for the worms.

12221.content: You smirk and toss him into the air. As he falls to the ground you snap him up, and proceed to turn him into mush. You start to chew the boy up, the sounds of bones cracking fills the air along with the sound of flesh being chewed. You finish with a loud gulp and a hearty belch. You pat your now very happy belly and take the long way around to your den. 12223.title: Kill him

122231.content:
You decide to hang the interloper by the neck, tossing him to the ground you gather up some vines which would serve well to being the noose and proceed to tie them together and bind the boys hands together behind his back all while he's unconcious.

You decide to keep some trophies of your kill so you remove the shoes from his feet, having never seen shoes of this style before before slipping the noose around the young boys neck and hoisting him up.

the sudden and sharp pain on his neck was enough to wake him up and make him start violently kicking and sobbing, socked feet desperately trying to find something to relieve the pressure but no such luck, you watch his chest desperately try to draw in air as his legs danced in the air. his eyes wide with pain and fear as they pleaded for you to let him down.

for a minute you consider actually letting him down...
122231.title: Hanging by the neck

1222312.content:
The fleeting thoughts of sparing this child was just that, fleeting. his tongue swells and sticks from his mouth as the child's drool escapes...

the fanning of the socked toes on the struggling victims feet become more desperate as each kick becomes more frantic... his eyes buldge out as they show yellow lines in them and his face turns bright red...

The kicking slows down some after a minute and his face becomes purple. the eyes of the young boy start to roll up as the kicking becomes a spastic jerk of his legs.

within a short time the motions stop entirely...

Deciding you performed a job well done you head back to your king, leaving the body dangling.
1222312.title: Keep watching the show.

info.brief_description: You are max. find a way home, or die.
info.description: You are Max. A thirteen year old boy who as awakened and found himself in a different world. He must navigate this new world, all the while being hunted by the servants of the king of monsters. You can play as either max or a monster that's hunting him. No sex. You can hard or soft vore him. Or kill him in some other fashion.
